about_the_game:
The bear hunt starts now.

To track bears, a hunter must be fully equipped. Be prepared with the Bear Hunter Pack bonus content.

Winchester XPR Strata Threaded bolt-action rifle

This bolt-action rifle with mid-weight barrel is ideal for large-calibre accurate shooting. It's an excellent choice for hunting bears and big game.

Browning Maral SF Grade 5 Monte Carlo Fluted rifle

With a grade-5 Monte Carlo wood stock and ingenious bolt return system, the Maral SF rifle is a high-end model specially designed for experienced hunters.

Bear hunting licence

Start tracking black bears and grizzlies right away with a free and permanent in-game bear hunting licence.

Browning clothes

A complete outfit for hunting big game on the prowl:
  • Hell’s Canyon 2, Infinity jacket and trousers
  • Phase Liner gloves
  • Trail-Lite cap
